entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries near noon and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except temperature steady near minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10 except temperature steady near minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
